full_title_en: Horowitz Index for Lung Function (P/F Ratio)
medium_description_en: Assesses lung function, particularly in intubated patients.
before_use:
Launched during COVID-19 crisis. COVID-19 Resource Center.

Tips for COVID-19: Use to determine floor vs. ICU. Assesses lung functions, especially for patients on ventilators.

seo.meta_description_en: The Horowitz index for Lung Function (P/F ratio) assesses lung function, particularly in intubated patients.

about.formula_en:
Horowitz Index (P/F Ratio), mmHg = PaO2 / FiO2 (see table below)

 

Estimating FiO₂ from oxygen flow/delivery rates:

  • 4 L/min = 37%

  • 5 L/min = 41%
